parameter-group.name: basic
parameter-group.label: Required configuration
parameter-group.description: Below fields are required in order to read/write data from PLC.

parameter.name: field
parameter.label: Field
parameter.description: Field to be read from PLC. Supported format of field: indexGroup:indexOffset:BOOL[numberOfElements]* (also using 0x notation)

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Time between next poll cycles. If no value is given polling is based on value set on thing or bridge value.
